name: 轻小说文库
request: https://www.wenku8.net/modules/article/search.php?searchtype=articlename&searchkey=[$key]&page=[$page]@charset->gbk@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/85.0.4183.83 Safari/537.36

search.list: function Main(html){if(html.indexOf('小说目录')!=-1){var myArray=new Array();myArray.push(html);return myArray;}return jsoups(html,'#content > table > tbody > tr > td > div');}
search.title: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('小说目录')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'#content > div > table > tbody > tr > td > table > tbody > tr > td > span > b');};return jsoup(text,'div:nth-child(2) > b > a');}
search.url: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('小说目录')!=-1){return 'https://www.wenku8.net/book/'+strmiddle(text,'bid=','"')+'.htm';};return jsoup(text,'div:nth-child(2) > b > a@attr->href');}

detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#content > div:nth-child(1) > table:nth-child(1) > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(2)');}
detail.introduction: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#content > div:nth-child(1) > table:nth-child(4) > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(2) > span:nth-child(6)');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#content > div:nth-child(1) > table:nth-child(1) > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(4)');}
detail.catalog_url: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#content > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(6) > div > span:nth-child(1) > fieldset > div > a@attr->href');}

finds.request: https://www.wenku8.net/modules/article/toplist.php?sort=lastupdate@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/85.0.4183.83 Safari/537.36
finds.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'#content > table > tbody > tr > td > div');}
finds.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div:nth-child(2) > b > a');}
